name: Scenario: Search for a automtion course

children.description: Juan clicks on  Boton para ingresar al Login

testSteps.description: When he search for the course Recursos Automatizacion Bancolombia on the choucair academy platform

children.description: Juan clicks on  Selecciona cursos y certificaciones

testSteps.description: Then he finds the course called resources Recursos Automatizacion Bancolombia
